1: וַיְהִ֨י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מִיָּמִ֜ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>But it came to pass within a while after</n> בִּימֵ֣י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the time</n> קְצִיר־ <sup>7105 </sup> <n>harvest</n> חִטִּ֗ים <sup>2406 </sup> <n>of wheat</n> וַיִּפְקֹ֨ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>visited</n> שִׁמְשׁ֤וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>that Samson</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>his wife</n> בִּגְדִ֣י <sup>1423 </sup> <n>A young</n> עִזִּ֔ים <sup>5795 </sup> <n>goat</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and he said</n> אָבֹ֥אָה <sup>935 </sup> <n>I will go in</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אִשְׁתִּ֖י <sup>802 </sup> <n>to my wife</n> הֶחָ֑דְרָה <sup>2315 </sup> <n>into the chamber</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> נְתָנ֥וֹ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>would not suffer</n> אָבִ֖יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>But her father</n> לָבֽוֹא׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>him to go in</n>
2: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אָבִ֗יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>And her father</n> אָמֹ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>I verily</n> אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>thought</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> שָׂנֹ֣א <sup>8130 </sup> <n>that thou hadst utterly</n> שְׂנֵאתָ֔הּ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>hated</n> וָאֶתְּנֶ֖נָּה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>her therefore I gave</n> לְמֵרֵעֶ֑ךָ <sup>4828 </sup> <n>her to thy companion</n> הֲלֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֲחֹתָ֤הּ <sup>269 </sup> <n>sister</n> הַקְּטַנָּה֙ <sup>6996 </sup> <n>[is] not her younger</n> טוֹבָ֣ה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>fairer</n> מִמֶּ֔נָּה <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> תְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> לְךָ֖ תַּחְתֶּֽיהָ׃ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>instead</n>
3: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> נִקֵּ֥יתִי <sup>5352 </sup> <n>shall I be more blameless</n> הַפַּ֖עַם <sup>6471 </sup> <n>concerning them Now</n> מִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>than the Philistines</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> עֹשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>though I do</n> אֲנִ֛י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עִמָּ֖ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>them</n> רָעָֽה׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>them a displeasure</n>
4: וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> וַיִּלְכֹּ֖ד <sup>3920 </sup> <n>and caught</n> שְׁלֹשׁ־ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>three</n> מֵא֣וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> שׁוּעָלִ֑ים <sup>7776 </sup> <n>foxes</n> וַיִּקַּ֣ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> לַפִּדִ֗ים <sup>3940 </sup> <n>firebrands</n> וַיֶּ֤פֶן <sup>6437 </sup> <n>and turned</n> זָנָב֙ <sup>2180 </sup> <n>tail</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> זָנָ֔ב <sup>2180 </sup> <n>to tail</n> וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and put</n> לַפִּ֥יד <sup>3940 </sup> <n>firebrand</n> אֶחָ֛ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>a</n> בֵּין־ <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> שְׁנֵ֥י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>between two</n> הַזְּנָב֖וֹת <sup>2180 </sup> <n>tails</n> בַּתָּֽוֶךְ׃ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n>
5: וַיַּבְעֶר־ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>And when he had set</n> אֵשׁ֙ <sup>784 </sup> <n>on fire</n> בַּלַּפִּידִ֔ים <sup>3940 </sup> <n>the brands</n> וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>he let [them] go</n> בְּקָמ֣וֹת <sup>7054 </sup> <n>into the standing corn</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וַיַּבְעֵ֛ר <sup>1197 </sup> <n>and burnt up</n> מִגָּדִ֥ישׁ <sup>1430 </sup> <n>both the shocks</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>along</n> קָמָ֖ה <sup>7054 </sup> <n>and also the standing corn</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>along</n> כֶּ֥רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>with the vineyards</n> זָֽיִת׃ <sup>2132 </sup> <n>[and] olives</n>
6: וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> פְלִשְׁתִּים֮ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>Then the Philistines</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> עָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Who hath done</n> זֹאת֒ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>this? And they answered</n> שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <sup>8123 </sup> <n>Samson</n> חֲתַ֣ן <sup>2860 </sup> <n>the son in law</n> הַתִּמְנִ֔י <sup>8554 </sup> <n>of the Timnite</n> כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> לָקַ֣ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>because he had taken</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <sup>802 </sup> <n>his wife</n> וַֽיִּתְּנָ֖הּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and given</n> לְמֵרֵעֵ֑הוּ <sup>4828 </sup> <n>her to his companion</n> וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came up</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>And the Philistines</n> וַיִּשְׂרְפ֥וּ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and burnt</n> אוֹתָ֛הּ <sup>853 </sup> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָבִ֖יהָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>her and her father</n> בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n>
7: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> אִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>unto them Though</n> תַּעֲשׂ֖וּן <sup>6213 </sup> <n>ye have done</n> כָּזֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>this</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Since</n> נִקַּ֥מְתִּי <sup>5358 </sup> <n>yet will I be avenged</n> בָכֶ֖ם וְאַחַ֥ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>of you and after</n> אֶחְדָּֽל׃ <sup>2308 </sup> <n>that I will cease</n>
8: וַיַּ֨ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>And he smote</n> אוֹתָ֥ם <sup>853 </sup> שׁ֛וֹק <sup>7785 </sup> <n>them hip</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יָרֵ֖ךְ <sup>3409 </sup> <n>thigh</n> מַכָּ֣ה <sup>4347 </sup> <n>slaughter</n> גְדוֹלָ֑ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with a great</n> וַיֵּ֣רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and he went down</n> וַיֵּ֔שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and dwelt</n> בִּסְעִ֖יף <sup>5585 </sup> <n>in the top</n> סֶ֥לַע <sup>5553 </sup> <n>of the rock</n> עֵיטָֽם׃ <sup>5862 </sup> <n>Etam</n> ס
9: וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>went up</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>Then the Philistines</n> וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>and pitched</n> בִּיהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>in Judah</n> וַיִּנָּטְשׁ֖וּ <sup>5203 </sup> <n>and spread</n> בַּלֶּֽחִי׃ <sup>3896 </sup> <n>themselves in Lehi</n>
10: וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And the men</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> לָמָ֖ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> עֲלִיתֶ֣ם <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Why are ye come up</n> עָלֵ֑ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>against us? And they answered</n> לֶאֱס֤וֹר <sup>631 </sup> <n>To bind</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <sup>8123 </sup> <n>Samson</n> עָלִ֔ינוּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>are we come up</n> לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n> ל֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to him</n> עָ֥שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to him as he hath done</n> לָֽנוּ׃
11: וַיֵּרְד֡וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>went</n> שְׁלֹשֶׁת֩ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>Then three</n> אֲלָפִ֨ים <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> אִ֜ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> מִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> סְעִיף֮ <sup>5585 </sup> <n>to the top</n> סֶ֣לַע <sup>5553 </sup> <n>of the rock</n> עֵיטָם֒ <sup>5862 </sup> <n>Etam</n> וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> לְשִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>to Samson</n> הֲלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Knowest</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מֹשְׁלִ֥ים <sup>4910 </sup> <n>[are] rulers</n> בָּ֙נוּ֙ פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>thou not that the Philistines</n> וּמַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> זֹּ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>that</n> עָשִׂ֣יתָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>over us? what [is] this [that] thou hast done</n> לָּ֑נוּ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto us? And he said</n> לָהֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>to them</n> עָ֣שׂוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto them As they did</n> לִ֔י כֵּ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> עָשִׂ֥יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto me so have I done</n> לָהֶֽם׃
12: וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> לוֹ֙ לֶאֱסָרְךָ֣ <sup>631 </sup> <n>to bind</n> יָרַ֔דְנוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>unto him We are come down</n> לְתִתְּךָ֖ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thee that we may deliver</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>thee into the hand</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָהֶם֙ שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> הִשָּׁבְע֣וּ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>unto them Swear</n> לִ֔י פֶּֽן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>you will not</n> תִּפְגְּע֥וּן <sup>6293 </sup> <n>unto me that ye will not fall upon</n> בִּ֖י אַתֶּֽם׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n>
13: וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they spake</n> ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him saying</n> לֹ֚א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָסֹ֤ר <sup>631 </sup> <n>No but we will bind</n> נֶֽאֱסָרְךָ֙ <sup>631 </sup> <n>thee fast</n> וּנְתַנּ֣וּךָ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and deliver</n> בְיָדָ֔ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>thee into their hand</n> וְהָמֵ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>but surely</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> נְמִיתֶ֑ךָ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>we will not kill</n> וַיַּאַסְרֻ֗הוּ <sup>631 </sup> <n>thee And they bound</n> בִּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>him with two</n> עֲבֹתִ֣ים <sup>5688 </sup> <n>cords</n> חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <sup>2319 </sup> <n>new</n> וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּהוּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and brought him up</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַסָּֽלַע׃ <sup>5553 </sup> <n>from the rock</n>
14: הוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בָ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>[And] when he came</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> לֶ֔חִי <sup>3896 </sup> <n>unto Lehi</n> וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>the Philistines</n> הֵרִ֣יעוּ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>shouted</n> לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n> וַתִּצְלַ֨ח <sup>6743 </sup> <n>came mightily</n> עָלָ֜יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> ר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>him and the Spirit</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַתִּהְיֶ֨ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הָעֲבֹתִ֜ים <sup>5688 </sup> <n>upon him and the cords</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>were on</n> זְרוֹעוֹתָ֗יו <sup>2220 </sup> <n>that [were] upon his arms</n> כַּפִּשְׁתִּים֙ <sup>6593 </sup> <n>became as flax</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>is</n> בָּעֲר֣וּ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>that was burnt</n> בָאֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n> וַיִּמַּ֥סּוּ <sup>4549 </sup> <n>loosed</n> אֱסוּרָ֖יו <sup>612 </sup> <n>and his bands</n> מֵעַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>from</n> יָדָֽיו׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>from off his hands</n>
15: וַיִּמְצָ֥א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>And he found</n> לְחִֽי־ <sup>3895 </sup> <n>jawbone</n> חֲמ֖וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>of an ass</n> טְרִיָּ֑ה <sup>2961 </sup> <n>a new</n> וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and put forth</n> יָדוֹ֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> וַיִּקָּחֶ֔הָ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> וַיַּךְ־ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>it and slew</n> בָּ֖הּ אֶ֥לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>a thousand</n> אִֽישׁ׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n>
16: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> בִּלְחִ֣י <sup>3895 </sup> <n>With the jawbone</n> הַחֲמ֔וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>of an ass</n> חֲמ֖וֹר <sup>2563 </sup> <n>clay</n> חֲמֹרָתָ֑יִם <sup>2563 </sup> <n>clay</n> בִּלְחִ֣י <sup>3895 </sup> <n>with the jaw</n> הַחֲמ֔וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>of an ass</n> הִכֵּ֖יתִי <sup>5221 </sup> <n>have I slain</n> אֶ֥לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>a thousand</n> אִֽישׁ׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n>
17: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּכַלֹּת֣וֹ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when he had made an end</n> לְדַבֵּ֔ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>of speaking</n> וַיַּשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>that he cast away</n> הַלְּחִ֖י <sup>3895 </sup> <n>the jawbone</n> מִיָּד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of his hand</n> וַיִּקְרָ֛א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called</n> לַמָּק֥וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>that place</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> רָ֥מַת לֶֽחִי׃ <sup>7437 </sup> <n>Ramathlehi</n>
18: וַיִּצְמָא֮ <sup>6770 </sup> <n>athirst</n> מְאֹד֒ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>And he was sore</n> וַיִּקְרָ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>on the LORD</n> וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אַתָּה֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> נָתַ֣תָּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Thou hast given</n> בְיַֽד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into the hand</n> עַבְדְּךָ֔ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of thy servant</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַתְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <sup>8668 </sup> <n>deliverance</n> הַגְּדֹלָ֖ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>this great</n> הַזֹּ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> וְעַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> אָמ֣וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and now shall I die</n> בַּצָּמָ֔א <sup>6772 </sup> <n>for thirst</n> וְנָפַלְתִּ֖י <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and fall</n> בְּיַ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into the hand</n> הָעֲרֵלִֽים׃ <sup>6189 </sup> <n>uncircumcised</n>
19: וַיִּבְקַ֨ע <sup>1234 </sup> <n>clave</n> אֱלֹהִ֜ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>But God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמַּכְתֵּ֣שׁ <sup>4388 </sup> <n>an hollow place</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּלֶּ֗חִי <sup>3895 </sup> <n>that [was] in the jaw</n> וַיֵּצְא֨וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and there came</n> מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>that</n> מַ֙יִם֙ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> וַיֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>thereout and when he had drunk</n> וַתָּ֥שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>came again</n> רוּח֖וֹ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>his spirit</n> וַיֶּ֑חִי <sup>2421 </sup> <n>and he revived</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֣ן ׀ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> קָרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>wherefore he called</n> שְׁמָ֗הּ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> עֵ֤ין הַקּוֹרֵא֙ <sup>5875 </sup> <n>thereof Enhakkore</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּלֶּ֔חִי <sup>3896 </sup> <n>which [is] in Lehi</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> הַיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>unto this day</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n>
